title: Chris on the Beauty of Calculus, Principles v. Rules, Local Governance
description:
Conversation with Chris about the principles of calculus and where that pattern shows up throughout our world.
Infinite divisibility, the method of exhaustion
Reductionism v. the heroic nature of science exploration
Picasso, "Art is a lie that makes us realize truth."
Artificial intelligence and the common sense knowledge problem.
The frame problem and the category problem.
Putting it all back together. 
Differentiating, then integrating.
Chris' conversation with Paul VanderKlay:
  https://youtu.be/d3aFCtt6HgQ
Paul VanderKlay's discussion of the frame problem:
  https://youtu.be/W4kFnshkORY
Hubert Dreyfus on the Frame Problem https://youtu.be/SUZUbYCBtGI
Hubert Dreyfus on Socrates https://youtu.be/LG5nCkcZm-g
